multiplechoiceresponse.p: Using the XPENDING command, we can see the value of the time-since-delivery field for each message in the Pending Entries List. What happens to the time-since-delivery value when a consumer reads the message using XREADGROUP ?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Choose one answer:

choicegroup.choice: The value doubles each time it is read
The value is deleted, since the message is removed from the Pending Entries List

div.p: When a pending message is read or re-read by a consumer using the XREADGROUP command, that message's time-since-delivery field has its value reset to 0.
